Audio.Locality: Boa Nova, Wet Forest, state of Bahia
Audio.Author: Dan Lane
Audio.Comments: Natural vocalizations from a male perched on bare top of tall introduced bamboo. A few red feathers noted on throat. Two other individuals present. Disturbed roadside in humid mata atlantica. img:http://www.flickr.com/photos/8013969@N03/8453946166/ bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
